sys_script_include.name: EventRecordUtils

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_62959bd383cb2210de39f120feaad3d9
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1790195_event_ma.EventRecordUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>EventRecordUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var EventRecordUtils = Class.create();
EventRecordUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

	fetchAllTaskForEvent : function(eventId){
		var eventGr = new GlideRecord('x_1790195_event_ma_event_record');
		var result = [];
		if(eventGr.get(eventId)){
			var taskGr = new GlideRecord('x_1790195_event_ma_event_task');
			taskGr.addQuery('event_id',eventId);
			taskGr.query();
			while(taskGr.next()){
				result.push(taskGr.getDisplayValue('number'));
			}
		}
		return result;
	},

    type: 'EventRecordUtils'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-04 18:05:12</sys_created_on><sys_id>62959bd383cb2210de39f120feaad3d9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>EventRecordUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Event Management &amp; Planning System" source="x_1790195_event_ma">133c05db83032210de39f120feaad3a8</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Event Management &amp; Planning System">133c05db83032210de39f120feaad3a8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_62959bd383cb2210de39f120feaad3d9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-04 18:18:00</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
